meanings.definition: Something that protrudes or juts out.
meanings.sent1: The tree had small protrusions on its bark.
meanings.sent2: I noticed some protrusions on the surface of the rock.
meanings.sent3: The protrusions on the cake made it look like a mini mountain range.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement caused her hair to stand up like tiny protrusions.
meanings.sent5: The alien spaceship had glowing protrusions along its sides.

meanings.definition: The act of protruding or extending outward.
meanings.sent1: The sudden protrusions of the snake startled me.
meanings.sent2: The protrusions of the branches reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent3: The protrusions of the balloon made it look like a misshapen animal.
meanings.sent4: The protrusions of the music notes danced in the air.
meanings.sent5: The protrusions of the building's design added a unique touch to the skyline.
